## Exponential distribution

```{r}
expo <- function(lambda){
  u <-runif(1)
  s <- -log(1-u)/lambda
}
```

```{r}
n <- 1000
lambda <- 3

sample <- vector(length = n)

for (i in 1:n){
  sample[i] <- expo(lambda)
}

hist(sample)

```

## Triangular

```{r}
trian <- function(){
  u <- runif(1)
  if (u <= 0.5){
    s <- sqrt(2*u)
  }
  else{
    s <- (4-sqrt(8-8*u))/2
  }
}
```

```{r}
n <- 1000

sample <- vector(length = n)

for (i in 1:n){
  sample[i] <- trian()
}

hist(sample)
```
